name: ontr2
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0)), wi(wa(wss(c0, c2), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(c0, c1)))

stmt.origin: syl2an(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0), wi(wa(wss(c0, c2), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(c0, c1)), word(c0), word(c1))
stmt.pretty: syl2an(c0 ∈ On, c1 ∈ On, ((c0 ⊆ c2 ∧ c2 ∈ c1)→ c0 ∈ c1), Ord(c0), Ord(c1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0)), wi(wa(wss(c0, c2), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(c0, c1)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, con0), word(c0))
-| wi(wcel(c1, con0), word(c1))
-| wi(wa(word(c0), word(c1)), wi(wa(wss(c0, c2), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(c0, c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0)), wi(wa(wss(c0, c2), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(c0, c1)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, con0), word(c0))
-| wi(wcel(c1, con0), word(c1))
-| wi(wa(word(c0), word(c1)), wi(wa(wss(c0, c2), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(c0, c1)))

|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0)), wi(wa(wss(c0, c2), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(c0, c1)))
-| wi(wcel(c1, con0), word(c1))
-| wi(wa(word(c0), word(c1)), wi(wa(wss(c0, c2), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(c0, c1)))

|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0)), wi(wa(wss(c0, c2), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(c0, c1)))
-| wi(wa(word(c0), word(c1)), wi(wa(wss(c0, c2), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(c0, c1)))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(word(c0), word(c1)), wi(wa(wss(c0, c2), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(c0, c1)))

cumulated.origin: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0)), wi(wa(wss(c0, c2), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(c0, c1)))

comment: Transitive law for ordinal numbers. Exercise 3 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 40. (Contributed by NM, 6-Nov-2003.)
